name: Birdie
title: The Chain Wielding Brawler
subtitle: A massive fighter who uses his chain and brute strength to dominate opponents
lore: A towering street fighter with a unique fighting style that combines his massive size with a deadly chain weapon. Despite his intimidating appearance, Birdie's personality is as colorful as his mohawk, and his appetite for battle is matched only by his appetite for food.

passive.name: Chain Master
passive.description: Birdie's basic attacks have increased range. Every third attack pulls the enemy towards him.

Q.name: Chain Grab
Q.description: Birdie throws his chain in a line, pulling the first enemy hit towards him and dealing [80/150/220/290/360] damage. If the target hits a wall, they are stunned for [0.75s].

W.name: Bull Charge
W.description: Birdie charges forward, dealing [90/160/230/300/370] damage to enemies in his path and knocking them aside. The charge can be canceled early by reactivating the ability.

E.name: Chain Sweep
E.description: Birdie swings his chain in a wide arc, dealing [70/140/210/280/350] damage and slowing enemies hit by [40%] for [2s].

R.name: Chain Cyclone
R.description: Birdie spins his chain around him for [4s], dealing [100/175/250] damage per second to nearby enemies and pulling them towards him. During this time, Birdie gains [30%] damage reduction.

1.name: Regeneration
1.description: After taking damage, Birdie regenerates [5%] of his MAXHP in [5s] (10s cooldown).

1.name: Combat Healing
1.description: Birdie heals 2.5% maximum HP after every successful ability hit.

5.name: Tenacity
5.description: Enemy stuns and slows last 50% less on Birdie.

5.name: Execution Chain
5.description: Chain Slash (W) deals 25% more damage to enemies below 50% HP.

10.name: Prison Guard
10.description: Every enemy rooted by R grants Birdie 5% damage reduction for 5 seconds.

10.name: Grievous Prison
10.description: Chain Prison reduces the healing received of hit enemies by 35%.

15.name: Enhanced Healing
15.description: Every heal on Birdie is 20% more effective.

15.name: Chain Slow
15.description: E ability slows enemies by 25% for 3 seconds.

20.name: Prison Master
20.description: Chain Prison increases damage dealt to rooted enemies by 30%.

20.name: Last Prison
20.description: When Birdie dies, the two closest enemies are rooted (like R).

20.name: Chain Mastery
20.description: The second hit of Chain Slash deals 30% more damage.
